input.label: Site
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup SPSite | search NOT ServerRelativeUrl="/my/*" | table Id,Url | sort Url

chart.title: Document Views over Time
chart.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | timechart count

table.title: Document Views by User
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | stats latest(_time) as _time by UserName | table _time, UserName | sort _time

table.title: Document Updates by User
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 (Event=2 OR Event=4 OR Event=5 OR Event=10 OR Event=14) SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | sort _time | table _time, UserName

table.title: Users who have not read Document
table.searchString: |inputlookup SPUser | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT SiteId | where SiteId="$Url$" | join type=outer LoginName [search eventtype=mssharepoint-audit SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | stats latest(_time) as tt by UserName | rename UserName as LoginName] | where isnull(tt) | table LoginName,DisplayName | sort LoginName
